SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface AppointmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentController
public interface AppointmentService
Interface defining operations for managing appointments between patients and doctors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableSlots

      List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableSlots(LocalDate date, Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves available appointment slots for a given doctor on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which to check available slots.
      doctor - The doctor whose available slots are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of available appointment slots.

    • scheduleAppointment

      Appointment scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, AppointmentSlot slot)
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with a specified doctor at a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient scheduling the appointment.
      doctor - The doctor with whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      slot - The time slot for the appointment.
      Returns:
      The scheduled Appointment object.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, AppointmentSlot newSlot)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new time slot.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newSlot - The new appointment slot.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
      Retrieves the scheduled appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose scheduled appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of the patient's scheduled appointments.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves upcoming appointments for a given doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of the doctor's upcoming appointments.

    • getPendingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getPendingAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves pending appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose pending appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of the doctor's pending appointments.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      boolean updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentId, AppointmentStatus status)
      Updates the status of an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      status - The new status for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment status was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getAllAppointments

      List<Appointment> getAllAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments for the specified doctor.

    • getAllAppointments

      List<Appointment> getAllAppointments(Patient patient)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments for the specified patient.

    • getAllAppointments

      List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments across all doctors and patients.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments.

    • getAppointmentsByDate

      List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves appointments scheduled on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments on the specified date.

    • getAppointmentById

      Optional<Appointment> getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the appointment if found, or an empty Optional otherwise.

    • getAppointmentsByStatus

      List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByStatus(AppointmentStatus status)
      Retrieves appointments based on their status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status of the appointments to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments with the specified status.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      void recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, String serviceType, List<Prescription> prescriptions, String notes)
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including service type, prescriptions, and notes.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment.
      serviceType - The type of service provided during the appointment.
      prescriptions - The list of prescriptions issued during the appointment.
      notes - Additional consultation notes.
